name: Retro Game
description:
I little project for Trijam 97. The traffic lights have gone out! Cars are driving without order! With your quick thinking skills you grab the first burrito you see and attempt to save the city...

Yes burrito.

Controls: 

Arrow keys to direct cars. (right sends cars going from right to left faster, up sends cars going from bottom to top faster etc.) Don't let the cars hit.

Don't ask why the cars can strafe. They're just really good drivers!
